title: [K-12] Digital Resource Quality Management Practices for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in science and ability to use basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Digital resource quality verification and improvement project in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Explain five criteria for evaluating functionality and reliability of digital materials based on adult learning theory
Propose instructional content design strategies for science education incorporating Kolb’s Learning Cycle and Gagné’s Model
Create a digital material quality checklist reflecting sub-characteristics (usability, maintainability, portability) of the ISO/IEC 9126 standard
Select one science education digital material per team, perform quality diagnostics, and submit improvement proposals in a project report
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
